error.message: Parameter $database of method Drupal\prev_next\PrevNextApi::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.
Call to deprecated constant REQUEST_TIME: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal::time()->getRequestTime();
Call to deprecated constant REQUEST_TIME: Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal::time()->getRequestTime();

Parameter $database of method Drupal\prev_next\PrevNextHelper::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
